text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy Now, the Japanese government is hiding the inconvenient facts and continuing it, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has a false habit, underreporting the number of people infected with coronavirus, Japan is now like China  Is concealing the facts.  Very dangerous condition.
